name: Drive-A-Car Sprint 2
description:
Two fun car levels.

1. Collect the pickups open the gate, avoid hitting the spheres and reach the goal

2. Enjoy the view, get to the finish line enjoy the music pick up the drops for extra points.

W,A,S,D to move 

Space for handbrake

V incase the car flips

Try to beat my personal best.  40 seconds

Time doesn't stop between the levels !!!

Song; Ocean Drive Duke Dumont
